SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class LocalServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.LocalServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server, Serializable, Remote
public class LocalServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Server
Class LocalServer is the main network interface for the server application.
It communicates to either a LocalClient via RMI or a ClientStub via Socket.
This class acts as a router for messages to either the LobbyController or a specific GameController.
See Also:

      port - the port to use for rmi communication
      csf - the client socket factory to use for rmi communication
      ssf - the server socket factory to use for rmi communication

  • Method Details

    • addGameControllers

      public void addGameControllers(Map<Client,GameController> mapping)
      Add clientID->controller mapping to current map.
      Called by the LobbyController each time a new game starts.
      Synchronization is over the lobby controller instance. (the lock is redundant)
      Parameters:
      mapping - client mapping to add

    • removeGameControllers

      public void removeGameControllers(List<Client> clients)
      Remove controller mapping from current map for the given clients.
      Called by the LobbyController each time a game ends.
      Synchronization is over the lobby controller instance. (the lock is redundant)
      Parameters:
      clients - clients to remove

    • update

      Description copied from interface: Server
      Notify the server of a client's message
      Specified by:
      update in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - the client that sent the message
      message - the message sent by the client
